                                                                           =
                                       : : Sting : :

                     =
                                                                           =
Sting:  Alright, let's head out.

                                         =
            He transforms into a scorpion vehicle.  Basically, a scorpion o=
n wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August=
 14, 2002 2:10 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Dies=
el: Great, glad to have you with us.

  He transformes back to truck mode.
=

  Diesel: Lets continue on our way!

  He continues to drive on.
    -----=
 Original Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret M=
essages


                                                                 =
                                                    : : Sting : :

        =
                                                                           =
         Sting smiles, and nods, acknowledging the offer.

                =
                                                                           =
 Sting:  It would be a pleasure to aid you all.
      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      S=
ent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 AM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages=



      : : Diesel : :

      Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Die=
sel had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

      Diesel: I have a propos=
ition for you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through the =
Transwarp rift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join us?

=
      Diesel waited for a reply.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
    From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: We=
dnesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  =
                                                                           =
                                           : : Sting : :

                 =
                                                                           =
        Sting nods and then smiles a bit.
            
                    =
                                                                           =
Sting:  It's a pleasure to meet you all.

                                 =
                                                He extends his arm and hand=
 out to Diesel, for a handshake.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
        From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          =
Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messa=
ges


          : : Diesel : :

          Diesel transforms to his robot mo=
de.

          Diesel: I am Diesel.

          He motions to the others.

 =
         Diesel: This is Arrow and Deemos.
            ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
            From: LurkerAbyss 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
            Subje=
ct: Re: Secret Messages


                                                 =
                                                                    : : Sti=
ng : :

                                                                   =
                            He walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

    =
                                                                           =
                  Sting:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are you?
              ----=
- Original Message ----- 
              From: RoboRick007 
              To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:5=
3 PM
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              : : Diesel =
: :

              The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drop=
s down infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a sto=
p.

              Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
              =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: LurkerAbyss 
        =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, August 1=
3, 2002 10:42 PM
                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


           =
                                                : : Sting : :

            =
                        A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending=
 from the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and D=
eemos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
                  =
----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: RoboRick007 
        =
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, Augu=
st 13, 2002 10:31 PM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


     =
             : : Diesel : :

                  Diesel pulls out, following =
the others towards their destination.
                    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
                    From: Hollywood Narrator 
                =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, August 1=
3, 2002 9:47 PM
                    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        =
            Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime a=
nd speeds towards the destination. Deems transforms into a mechanical vultu=
re and flies along behind...

                      ----- Original Message =
-----
                      From: RoboRick007
                      To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com
                      Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:=
29 PM
                      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                =
      : : Diesel : :

                      He smiled at his friends excitm=
ent.

                      Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe=
, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

                      Die=
sel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

                      Diesel: Roll=
 out!

                      He drives out and pulls to the side waiting fo=
r Arrow to lead the way.
